title: want to win basically every URF game?

replies.body:
Yuumi is permanently banned in my games.


I'm sick of seeing   {{champion:350}} {{champion:33}}  /  {{champion:350}}{{champion:120}}  / {{champion:350}}{{champion:36}} auto win games with their eyes closed.
No worries from me - I always ban Mundo.
And than meet the actual freewin in Urf: {{champion:114}}

> [{quoted}](name=Titanium70,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=M7BxTvaV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-03T14:23:09.297+0000)
>
> And than meet the actual freewin in Urf: {{champion:114}}

I'm not sure about that one tbh. She was better in the past before URF changed to this one shot deal where champs like {{champion:122}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:412}} would just one shot you.
I mean... yuumi is close to busted in normal games so of course she's busted in urf

I mean, Yuumi plus anyone is pretty broken. Just had a game where her primary anchor died so she attached to a Janna and between the shield and heals we couldn't kill her unless the whole team happened to burst all at the exact same moment.
